        FcDesigner æ˜¯ä¸€æ¬¾åŸºäº Vue çš„ä½ä»£ç å¯è§†åŒ–è¡¨å•è®¾è®¡å™¨å·¥å…·ï¼Œé€šè¿‡æ•°æ®é©±åŠ¨è¡¨å•æ¸²æŸ“ã€‚å¯ä»¥é€šè¿‡æ‹–æ‹½çš„æ–¹å¼å¿«é€Ÿåˆ›å»ºè¡¨å•ï¼Œæé«˜å¼€å‘è€…å¯¹è¡¨å•çš„å¼€å‘æ•ˆç‡ï¼ŒèŠ‚çœå¼€å‘è€…çš„æ—¶é—´ã€‚å¹¶å¹¿æ³›åº”ç”¨äºåœ¨æ”¿åŠ¡ç³»ç»Ÿã€OA ç³»ç»Ÿã€ERP ç³»ç»Ÿã€ç”µå•†ç³»ç»Ÿã€æµç¨‹ç®¡ç†ç­‰é¢†åŸŸã€‚
    </div>
<div id="cnblogs_post_body" class="blogpost-body cnblogs-markdown">
<p><strong>FcDesigner æ˜¯ä¸€æ¬¾åŸºäº Vue çš„ä½ä»£ç å¯è§†åŒ–è¡¨å•è®¾è®¡å™¨å·¥å…·ï¼Œé€šè¿‡æ•°æ®é©±åŠ¨è¡¨å•æ¸²æŸ“ã€‚å¯ä»¥é€šè¿‡æ‹–æ‹½çš„æ–¹å¼å¿«é€Ÿåˆ›å»ºè¡¨å•ï¼Œæé«˜å¼€å‘è€…å¯¹è¡¨å•çš„å¼€å‘æ•ˆç‡ï¼ŒèŠ‚çœå¼€å‘è€…çš„æ—¶é—´ã€‚å¹¶å¹¿æ³›åº”ç”¨äºåœ¨æ”¿åŠ¡ç³»ç»Ÿã€OA ç³»ç»Ÿã€ERP ç³»ç»Ÿã€ç”µå•†ç³»ç»Ÿã€æµç¨‹ç®¡ç†ç­‰é¢†åŸŸã€‚</strong></p>
<p>æºç åœ°å€:&nbsp;<a href="https://github.com/xaboy/form-create-designer" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">Github</a>&nbsp;|&nbsp;<a href="https://gitee.com/xaboy/form-create-designer" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">Gitee</a>&nbsp;|&nbsp;<a href="https://view.form-create.com/" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">æ–‡æ¡£</a>&nbsp;|&nbsp;<a href="https://form-create.com/v3/designer/" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">åœ¨çº¿æ¼”ç¤º</a></p>
<h2 id="æ ¸å¿ƒåŠŸèƒ½">æ ¸å¿ƒåŠŸèƒ½ğŸ”¥</h2>

<li>å†…ç½®è¡¨å•å¤šè¯­è¨€ä½“ç³»ï¼Œè½»æ¾æ‰“ç ´è¯­è¨€éš”é˜‚ã€‚</li>
<li>æä¾› 30+ å¸¸ç”¨ç»„ä»¶ï¼Œæ¶µç›–è¡¨å•ç»„ä»¶ã€å¸ƒå±€ç»„ä»¶ã€è¾…åŠ©ç±»ç»„ä»¶ç­‰å„ç±»å®ç”¨æ¨¡å—ã€‚</li>

<li>æ”¯æŒç»„ä»¶æ ·å¼é…ç½®ï¼ŒåŠ¨æ€è°ƒæ•´ç»„ä»¶å°ºå¯¸ã€é¢œè‰²ã€é—´è·ç­‰æ ·å¼å±æ€§ã€‚</li>
<li>æ”¯æŒäº‹ä»¶äº¤äº’é…ç½®ï¼Œçµæ´»é…ç½®ç»„ä»¶äº‹ä»¶å“åº”é€»è¾‘ï¼Œå®ç°å¤æ‚äº¤äº’åœºæ™¯ã€‚</li>
<li>è¡¨å•å¤§çº²ã€æ“ä½œè®°å½•ã€æ•°æ®å½•å…¥ã€ç»„ä»¶ç”Ÿæˆã€äº‹ä»¶é…ç½®ã€è¡¨å•éªŒè¯ã€æ …æ ¼å¸ƒå±€ã€è¡¨æ ¼å¸ƒå±€ç­‰ã€‚</li>

<h3 id="-åŠŸèƒ½ä¼˜åŒ–">ğŸ”§ åŠŸèƒ½ä¼˜åŒ–:</h3>

<li>ä¼˜åŒ–äº‹ä»¶é…ç½®</li>
<li>ä¿®æ”¹å¼¹å‡ºæ¡†å®½åº¦ä¸º&nbsp;<strong>1080px</strong></li>
<li>æ”¯æŒé…ç½®äº‹ä»¶çš„æè¿°</li>
<li>ä¼˜åŒ–è®¾è®¡å™¨æ ·å¼</li>

<h3 id="-é—®é¢˜ä¿®å¤">ğŸ é—®é¢˜ä¿®å¤ï¼š</h3>

<h2 id="é…ç½®é¢æ¿"><strong>é…ç½®é¢æ¿</strong></h2>
<p>æ‚¨å¯ä»¥æ ¹æ®ä¸šåŠ¡éœ€æ±‚éšå¿ƒå®šåˆ¶è®¾è®¡å™¨ç•Œé¢å’ŒåŠŸèƒ½ç»„åˆå•¦ï¼Œç³»ç»Ÿä¼šè‡ªåŠ¨ç”Ÿæˆå¯¹åº”çš„é…ç½®å‚æ•°ï¼Œç®€ç›´ä¸è¦å¤ªæ–¹ä¾¿ï¼</p>
<p><img alt="image" loading="lazy" data-src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1384602/202507/1384602-20250716130016526-433196384.png" class="lazyload"></p>

<p>ä½œè€…ï¼šæ— æ‡ˆå¯å‡»<br>

æ¥æºï¼šç¨€åœŸæ˜é‡‘<br>
è‘—ä½œæƒå½’ä½œè€…æ‰€æœ‰ã€‚å•†ä¸šè½¬è½½è¯·è”ç³»ä½œè€…è·å¾—æˆæƒï¼Œéå•†ä¸šè½¬è½½è¯·æ³¨æ˜å‡ºå¤„ã€‚</p>
<h1 id="element-ui-ç‰ˆæœ¬è¡¨å•è®¾è®¡å™¨">Element UI ç‰ˆæœ¬è¡¨å•è®¾è®¡å™¨</h1>
<p><img alt="image" loading="lazy" data-src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1384602/202507/1384602-20250716130034133-1940272529.png" class="lazyload"></p>
<p>æœ¬é¡¹ç›®é‡‡ç”¨ Vue2.7 å’Œ Element UI è¿›è¡Œé¡µé¢æ„å»ºï¼Œå†…ç½®å¤šè¯­è¨€è§£å†³æ–¹æ¡ˆï¼Œæ”¯æŒäºŒæ¬¡æ‰©å±•å¼€å‘ï¼Œæ”¯æŒè‡ªå®šä¹‰ç»„ä»¶æ‰©å±•ã€‚<a href="https://www.form-create.com/designer/" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">æ¼”ç¤ºç«™</a></p>
<h2 id="å®‰è£…">å®‰è£…</h2>
<p>è¦å¼€å§‹ä½¿ç”¨&nbsp; <strong>@form-create/designer</strong>ï¼Œé¦–å…ˆéœ€è¦å°†å…¶å®‰è£…åˆ°æ‚¨çš„é¡¹ç›®ä¸­ã€‚å¯ä»¥é€šè¿‡ npm å®‰è£…ï¼š</p>
<pre><code class="language-sh">npm install @form-create/designer@^1
npm install @form-create/element-ui@^2.7
npm install element-ui
</code></pre>
<p>å¦‚å·²å®‰è£…æ—§ç‰ˆæœ¬æ¸²æŸ“å™¨ï¼Œè¯·æ‰§è¡Œä»¥ä¸‹å‘½ä»¤æ›´æ–°è‡³æœ€æ–°ç‰ˆï¼š</p>
<pre><code class="language-sh">npm update @form-create/element-ui@^2.7
</code></pre>
<p><strong>è¯·æ£€æŸ¥å½“å‰ Vue ç‰ˆæœ¬ï¼Œè‹¥ç‰ˆæœ¬ä½äº 2.7ï¼Œè¯·æ‰§è¡Œä»¥ä¸‹å‡çº§å‘½ä»¤ï¼š</strong></p>
<pre><code class="language-sh">npm update vue@^2.7
</code></pre>
<h2 id="å¼•å…¥">å¼•å…¥</h2>
<p><strong>Node.js å¼•å…¥</strong></p>
<p>å¯¹äº Node.js é¡¹ç›®ï¼Œæ‚¨éœ€è¦é€šè¿‡ npm å®‰è£…ç›¸å…³ä¾èµ–ï¼Œå¹¶åœ¨æ‚¨çš„é¡¹ç›®ä¸­å¼•å…¥å¹¶é…ç½®å®ƒä»¬ã€‚</p>
<pre><code class="language-js">import Vue from 'vue';
import FcDesigner from '@form-create/designer';
import ELEMENT from 'element-ui';
import 'element-ui/lib/theme-chalk/index.css';
// ä½¿ç”¨ Element UI
Vue.use(ELEMENT);
// ä½¿ç”¨ form-create å’Œ designer
Vue.use(FcDesigner);
Vue.use(FcDesigner.formCreate);
</code></pre>
<p><strong>CDN å¼•å…¥</strong></p>
<p>å¦‚æœæ‚¨å¸Œæœ›é€šè¿‡ CDN æ–¹å¼å¼•å…¥&nbsp;<strong>FcDesigner</strong>ï¼Œè¯·ç¡®ä¿å…ˆå¼•å…¥ Vue.js å’Œ Element UIã€‚ç„¶åå¼•å…¥&nbsp; <strong>@form-create/element-ui</strong>&nbsp;å’Œ&nbsp; <strong>@form-create/designer</strong>ï¼Œå¹¶åœ¨ Vue å®ä¾‹ä¸­è¿›è¡Œé…ç½®</p>
<pre><code class="language-html">&lt;!-- å¼•å…¥ Vue.js --&gt;
&lt;script src="https://unpkg.com/vue@2.7.16/dist/vue.js"&gt;&lt;/script&gt;
&lt;!-- å¼•å…¥ Element UI æ ·å¼ --&gt;
&lt;link rel="stylesheet" href="https://unpkg.com/element-ui/lib/theme-chalk/index.css"&gt;
&lt;!-- å¼•å…¥ Element UI --&gt;
&lt;script src="https://unpkg.com/element-ui/lib/index.js"&gt;&lt;/script&gt;
&lt;!-- å¼•å…¥ form-create å’Œ designer --&gt;
&lt;script src="https://unpkg.com/@form-create/element-ui/dist/form-create.min.js"&gt;&lt;/script&gt;
&lt;script src="https://unpkg.com/@form-create/designer/dist/index.min.js"&gt;&lt;/script&gt;
&lt;div id="app"&gt;
    &lt;fc-designer height="100vh"&gt;&lt;/fc-designer&gt;
&lt;/div&gt;
&lt;script&gt;
    Vue.use(FcDesigner);
    Vue.use(FcDesigner.formCreate);
    new Vue().$mount('#app');
&lt;/script&gt;
</code></pre>
<p><strong>ä½¿ç”¨</strong></p>
<p>åœ¨ Vue ç»„ä»¶ä¸­ï¼Œæ‚¨å¯ä»¥åƒä¸‹é¢è¿™æ ·ä½¿ç”¨ fc-designer ç»„ä»¶ï¼š</p>
<pre><code class="language-html">&lt;template&gt;
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&lt;fc-designer ref="designer" height="100vh" /&gt;
&lt;/template&gt;
</code></pre>
<p></p>
<h1 id="element-plus-ç‰ˆæœ¬è¡¨å•è®¾è®¡å™¨">Element Plus ç‰ˆæœ¬è¡¨å•è®¾è®¡å™¨</h1>
<p>@form-create/designer æ”¯æŒ Vue 3 ç¯å¢ƒï¼Œä»¥ä¸‹æ˜¯å¦‚ä½•åœ¨ Vue 3 é¡¹ç›®ä¸­å®‰è£…å’Œä½¿ç”¨è¯¥åº“çš„æŒ‡å—ã€‚</p>
<p><a href="https://www.form-create.com/vue3/designer/" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">æ¼”ç¤ºç«™</a></p>
<h2 id="å®‰è£…-1">å®‰è£…</h2>
<p>é¦–å…ˆï¼Œå®‰è£…&nbsp; <strong>@form-create/designer</strong>&nbsp;çš„ Vue 3 ç‰ˆæœ¬</p>
<pre><code class="language-sh">npm install @form-create/designer@^3
npm install @form-create/element-ui@^3
npm install element-plus
</code></pre>
<p>å¦‚å·²å®‰è£…æ—§ç‰ˆæœ¬æ¸²æŸ“å™¨ï¼Œè¯·æ‰§è¡Œä»¥ä¸‹å‘½ä»¤æ›´æ–°è‡³æœ€æ–°ç‰ˆï¼š</p>
<pre><code class="language-sh">npm update @form-create/element-ui@^3
</code></pre>
<h2 id="å¼•å…¥-1">å¼•å…¥</h2>
<p><strong>Node.js å¼•å…¥</strong></p>
<p>å¯¹äºä½¿ç”¨ Node.js çš„é¡¹ç›®ï¼ŒæŒ‰ç…§ä»¥ä¸‹æ­¥éª¤åœ¨æ‚¨çš„ Vue 3 é¡¹ç›®ä¸­å¼•å…¥å¹¶é…ç½®ï¼š</p>
<pre><code class="language-js">import { createApp } from 'vue';
import FcDesigner from '@form-create/designer';
import ElementPlus from 'element-plus';
import 'element-plus/dist/index.css';
// åˆ›å»º Vue åº”ç”¨
const app = createApp(App);
// ä½¿ç”¨ Element Plus å’Œ FcDesigner
app.use(ElementPlus);
app.use(FcDesigner);
app.use(FcDesigner.formCreate);
// æŒ‚è½½åº”ç”¨
app.mount('#app');
</code></pre>
<p><strong>CDN å¼•å…¥</strong></p>
<p>å¦‚æœæ‚¨é€‰æ‹©ä½¿ç”¨ CDNï¼Œå¯ä»¥æŒ‰ç…§ä»¥ä¸‹æ­¥éª¤åœ¨ HTML æ–‡ä»¶ä¸­å¼•å…¥ç›¸å…³ä¾èµ–ï¼š</p>
<pre><code class="language-html">&lt;!-- å¼•å…¥ Element Plus æ ·å¼ --&gt;
&lt;link href="https://unpkg.com/element-plus/dist/index.css" rel="stylesheet" /&gt;
&lt;!-- å¼•å…¥ Vue 3 --&gt;
&lt;script src="https://unpkg.com/vue"&gt;&lt;/script&gt;
&lt;!-- å¼•å…¥ Element Plus --&gt;
&lt;script src="https://unpkg.com/element-plus/dist/index.full.js"&gt;&lt;/script&gt;
&lt;!-- å¼•å…¥ form-create å’Œ designer --&gt;
&lt;script src="https://unpkg.com/@form-create/element-ui@next/dist/form-create.min.js"&gt;&lt;/script&gt;
&lt;script src="https://unpkg.com/@form-create/designer@next/dist/index.umd.js"&gt;&lt;/script&gt;
&lt;div id="app"&gt;
    &lt;fc-designer height="100vh"&gt;&lt;/fc-designer&gt;
&lt;/div&gt;
&lt;script&gt;
    const { createApp } = Vue;
    const app = createApp({});
    app.use(ElementPlus);
    app.use(FcDesigner);
    app.use(FcDesigner.formCreate);
    app.mount('#app');
&lt;/script&gt;
</code></pre>
<h2 id="ä½¿ç”¨">ä½¿ç”¨</h2>
<p>åœ¨ Vue 3 ç»„ä»¶ä¸­ï¼Œæ‚¨å¯ä»¥é€šè¿‡ä»¥ä¸‹æ–¹å¼ä½¿ç”¨ fc-designer ç»„ä»¶ï¼š</p>
<pre><code class="language-html">&lt;template&gt;
    &lt;fc-designer ref="designer" height="100vh" /&gt;
&lt;/template&gt;
&lt;script setup&gt;
    import { ref } from 'vue';
    // å¯ä»¥åœ¨æ­¤å¤„è·å–è®¾è®¡å™¨å®ä¾‹æˆ–è¿›è¡Œå…¶ä»–æ“ä½œ
    const designer = ref(null);
&lt;/script&gt;
</code></pre>
<h1 id="antdesignvue-ç‰ˆæœ¬-pc-ç«¯è¡¨å•è®¾è®¡å™¨">AntDesignVue ç‰ˆæœ¬ PC ç«¯è¡¨å•è®¾è®¡å™¨</h1>
<p><a href="https://form-create.com/v3/antd/designer/" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">æ¼”ç¤ºç«™</a></p>
<p>æœ¬é¡¹ç›®é‡‡ç”¨ Vue3.0 å’Œ Ant Design Vue è¿›è¡Œé¡µé¢æ„å»ºï¼Œå†…ç½®å¤šè¯­è¨€è§£å†³æ–¹æ¡ˆï¼Œæ”¯æŒäºŒæ¬¡æ‰©å±•å¼€å‘ï¼Œæ”¯æŒè‡ªå®šä¹‰ç»„ä»¶æ‰©å±•ã€‚</p>
<p><img alt="image" loading="lazy" data-src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1384602/202507/1384602-20250716130055369-2069115932.png" class="lazyload"></p>
<h2 id="å®‰è£…-2">å®‰è£…</h2>
<p>é¦–å…ˆï¼Œå®‰è£…&nbsp; <strong>@form-create/antd-designer</strong></p>
<pre><code class="language-sh">npm install @form-create/antd-designer@^3
npm install @form-create/ant-design-vue@^3
npm install ant-design-vue
</code></pre>
<p>å¦‚å·²å®‰è£…æ—§ç‰ˆæœ¬æ¸²æŸ“å™¨ï¼Œè¯·æ‰§è¡Œä»¥ä¸‹å‘½ä»¤æ›´æ–°è‡³æœ€æ–°ç‰ˆï¼š</p>
<pre><code class="language-sh">npm update @form-create/ant-design-vue@^3
</code></pre>
<h2 id="å¼•å…¥-2">å¼•å…¥</h2>
<p><strong>Node.js å¼•å…¥</strong></p>
<p>å¯¹äºä½¿ç”¨ Node.js çš„é¡¹ç›®ï¼ŒæŒ‰ç…§ä»¥ä¸‹æ­¥éª¤åœ¨æ‚¨çš„ Vue 3 é¡¹ç›®ä¸­å¼•å…¥å¹¶é…ç½®ï¼š</p>
<pre><code class="language-js">import FcDesigner from '@form-create/antd-designer'
import antd from 'ant-design-vue';
import 'ant-design-vue/dist/reset.css';
// åˆ›å»º Vue åº”ç”¨
const app = createApp(App);
app.use(antd)
app.use(FcDesigner)
app.use(FcDesigner.formCreate)
// æŒ‚è½½åº”ç”¨
app.mount('#app');
</code></pre>
<p><strong>CDN å¼•å…¥</strong></p>
<p>å¦‚æœæ‚¨é€‰æ‹©ä½¿ç”¨ CDNï¼Œå¯ä»¥æŒ‰ç…§ä»¥ä¸‹æ­¥éª¤åœ¨ HTML æ–‡ä»¶ä¸­å¼•å…¥ç›¸å…³ä¾èµ–ï¼š</p>
<pre><code class="language-html">&lt;link rel="stylesheet" href="https://unpkg.com/ant-design-vue@4/dist/reset.css"&gt;&lt;/link&gt;
&lt;link rel="stylesheet" href="https://fastly.jsdelivr.net/npm/vant@4/lib/index.css"&gt;&lt;/link&gt;
&lt;!-- å¼•å…¥ Vue åŠæ‰€éœ€ç»„ä»¶ --&gt;
&lt;script src="https://unpkg.com/dayjs/dayjs.min.js"&gt;&lt;/script&gt;
&lt;script src="https://unpkg.com/dayjs/plugin/customParseFormat.js"&gt;&lt;/script&gt;
&lt;script src="https://unpkg.com/dayjs/plugin/weekday.js"&gt;&lt;/script&gt;
&lt;script src="https://unpkg.com/dayjs/plugin/localeData.js"&gt;&lt;/script&gt;
&lt;script src="https://unpkg.com/dayjs/plugin/weekOfYear.js"&gt;&lt;/script&gt;
&lt;script src="https://unpkg.com/dayjs/plugin/weekYear.js"&gt;&lt;/script&gt;
&lt;script src="https://unpkg.com/dayjs/plugin/advancedFormat.js"&gt;&lt;/script&gt;
&lt;script src="https://unpkg.com/dayjs/plugin/quarterOfYear.js"&gt;&lt;/script&gt;
&lt;script src="https://unpkg.com/vue"&gt;&lt;/script&gt;
&lt;script src="https://unpkg.com/ant-design-vue@4/dist/antd.min.js"&gt;&lt;/script&gt;
&lt;script src="https://fastly.jsdelivr.net/npm/vant@4/lib/vant.min.js"&gt;&lt;/script&gt;


&lt;!-- å¼•å…¥ form-create åŠ fcDesigner --&gt;
&lt;script src="https://unpkg.com/@form-create/ant-design-vue@^3/dist/form-create.min.js"&gt;&lt;/script&gt;
&lt;script src="https://unpkg.com/@form-create/vant@^3/dist/form-create.min.js"&gt;&lt;/script&gt;
&lt;script src="https://unpkg.com/@form-create/antd-designer@^3/dist/index.umd.js"&gt;&lt;/script&gt;


&lt;div id="app"&gt;
    &lt;fc-designer height="100vh"&gt;&lt;/fc-designer&gt;
&lt;/div&gt;
&lt;!-- æŒ‚è½½ç»„ä»¶ --&gt;
&lt;script&gt;
    // åˆ›å»º Vue åº”ç”¨å®ä¾‹
    const app = Vue.createApp({});
    // æŒ‚è½½ AntDesignVue
    app.use(antd);
    // æŒ‚è½½ fcDesignerPro ç»„ä»¶
    app.use(FcDesigner);
    // æŒ‚è½½ formCreate
    app.use(FcDesigner.formCreate);
    // æŒ‚è½½ Vue åº”ç”¨
    app.mount('#app');
&lt;/script&gt;
</code></pre>
<h2 id="ä½¿ç”¨-1">ä½¿ç”¨</h2>
<p>åœ¨ Vue 3 ç»„ä»¶ä¸­ï¼Œæ‚¨å¯ä»¥é€šè¿‡ä»¥ä¸‹æ–¹å¼ä½¿ç”¨ fc-designer ç»„ä»¶ï¼š</p>
<pre><code class="language-html">&lt;template&gt;
    &lt;fc-designer ref="designer" height="100vh" /&gt;
&lt;/template&gt;
&lt;script setup&gt;
    import { ref } from 'vue';
    // å¯ä»¥åœ¨æ­¤å¤„è·å–è®¾è®¡å™¨å®ä¾‹æˆ–è¿›è¡Œå…¶ä»–æ“ä½œ
    const designer = ref(null);
&lt;/script&gt;
</code></pre>
<h1 id="ç§»åŠ¨ç«¯è¡¨å•è®¾è®¡å™¨">ç§»åŠ¨ç«¯è¡¨å•è®¾è®¡å™¨</h1>
<p><img alt="image" loading="lazy" data-src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1384602/202507/1384602-20250716130107087-1101291186.png" class="lazyload"></p>
<p><a href="https://form-create.com/v3/mobile/" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">æ¼”ç¤ºç«™</a></p>
<p>æœ¬é¡¹ç›®é‡‡ç”¨ Vue3.0 å’Œ ElementPlus è¿›è¡Œç§»åŠ¨ç«¯é¡µé¢æ„å»ºï¼Œç§»åŠ¨ç«¯ä½¿ç”¨çš„æ˜¯ vant4.0 ç‰ˆæœ¬ï¼Œå†…ç½®å¤šè¯­è¨€è§£å†³æ–¹æ¡ˆï¼Œæ”¯æŒäºŒæ¬¡æ‰©å±•å¼€å‘ï¼Œæ”¯æŒè‡ªå®šä¹‰ç»„ä»¶æ‰©å±•ã€‚</p>
<h2 id="å®‰è£…-3">å®‰è£…</h2>
<p>é¦–å…ˆï¼Œå®‰è£…&nbsp; <strong>@form-create/vant-designer</strong></p>
<pre><code class="language-sh">npm install @form-create/vant-designer@^3
npm install @form-create/element-ui@^3
npm install @form-create/vant@^3
npm install element-plus
npm install vant
</code></pre>
<p>å¦‚å·²å®‰è£…æ—§ç‰ˆæœ¬æ¸²æŸ“å™¨ï¼Œè¯·æ‰§è¡Œä»¥ä¸‹å‘½ä»¤æ›´æ–°è‡³æœ€æ–°ç‰ˆï¼š</p>
<pre><code class="language-sh">npm update @form-create/element-ui@^3
npm update @form-create/vant@^3
</code></pre>
<h2 id="å¼•å…¥-3">å¼•å…¥</h2>
<p><strong>Node.js å¼•å…¥</strong></p>
<p>å¯¹äºä½¿ç”¨ Node.js çš„é¡¹ç›®ï¼ŒæŒ‰ç…§ä»¥ä¸‹æ­¥éª¤åœ¨æ‚¨çš„ Vue 3 é¡¹ç›®ä¸­å¼•å…¥å¹¶é…ç½®ï¼š</p>
<pre><code class="language-js">import FcDesignerMobile from '@form-create/vant-designer'
import ELEMENT from 'element-plus';
import vant from 'vant';
import 'vant/lib/index.css';
import 'element-plus/dist/index.css';
// åˆ›å»º Vue åº”ç”¨
const app = createApp(App);
app.use(ELEMENT)
app.use(vant)
app.use(FcDesignerMobile)
app.use(FcDesignerMobile.formCreate)
// æŒ‚è½½åº”ç”¨
app.mount('#app');
</code></pre>
<p><strong>CDN å¼•å…¥</strong></p>
<p>å¦‚æœæ‚¨é€‰æ‹©ä½¿ç”¨ CDNï¼Œå¯ä»¥æŒ‰ç…§ä»¥ä¸‹æ­¥éª¤åœ¨ HTML æ–‡ä»¶ä¸­å¼•å…¥ç›¸å…³ä¾èµ–ï¼š</p>
<pre><code class="language-html">&lt;link rel="stylesheet" href="https://unpkg.com/element-plus/dist/index.css"&gt;&lt;/link&gt;
&lt;link rel="stylesheet" href="https://unpkg.com/vant@4/lib/index.css"/&gt;
&lt;script src="https://unpkg.com/vue"&gt;&lt;/script&gt;
&lt;script src="https://unpkg.com/element-plus/dist/index.full.js"&gt;&lt;/script&gt;
&lt;script src="https://unpkg.com/vant@4/lib/vant.min.js"&gt;&lt;/script&gt;
&lt;script src="https://unpkg.com/@form-create/element-ui@next/dist/form-create.min.js"&gt;&lt;/script&gt;
&lt;script src="https://unpkg.com/@form-create/vant@next/dist/form-create.min.js"&gt;&lt;/script&gt;
&lt;script src="https://unpkg.com/@form-create/vant-designer@next/dist/index.umd.js"&gt;&lt;/script&gt;
&lt;div id="app"&gt;
    &lt;fc-designer-mobile height="100vh"&gt;&lt;/fc-designer-mobile&gt;
&lt;/div&gt;
&lt;script&gt;
    const { createApp } = Vue;
    const app = createApp({});
    app.use(ElementPlus);
    app.use(vant);
    app.use(FcDesignerMobile);
    app.use(FcDesignerMobile.formCreate);
    app.mount('#app');
&lt;/script&gt;
</code></pre>
<h2 id="ä½¿ç”¨-2">ä½¿ç”¨</h2>
<p>åœ¨ Vue 3 ç»„ä»¶ä¸­ï¼Œæ‚¨å¯ä»¥é€šè¿‡ä»¥ä¸‹æ–¹å¼ä½¿ç”¨ fc-designer ç»„ä»¶ï¼š</p>
<pre><code class="language-html">&lt;template&gt;
    &lt;fc-designer-mobile ref="designer" height="100vh" /&gt;
&lt;/template&gt;
&lt;script setup&gt;
    import { ref } from 'vue';
    // å¯ä»¥åœ¨æ­¤å¤„è·å–è®¾è®¡å™¨å®ä¾‹æˆ–è¿›è¡Œå…¶ä»–æ“ä½œ
    const designer = ref(null);
&lt;/script&gt;
</code></pre>
<p></p>
<h2 id="è·å–è®¾è®¡è¡¨å•çš„æ•°æ®">è·å–è®¾è®¡è¡¨å•çš„æ•°æ®</h2>
<p>åœ¨è¡¨å•è®¾è®¡å™¨ä¸­ï¼Œå¯ä»¥é€šè¿‡ä»¥ä¸‹æ–¹æ³•è·å–è¡¨å•çš„ç”Ÿæˆè§„åˆ™å’Œé…ç½®ï¼Œè¿™äº›æ•°æ®é€šå¸¸ä¼šè¢«ä¿å­˜åˆ°æ•°æ®åº“ä¸­ï¼Œä»¥ä¾¿åç»­åŠ è½½å’Œå›æ˜¾ã€‚</p>
<pre><code class="language-js">//è·å–è¡¨å•çš„ç”Ÿæˆè§„åˆ™
const ruleJson = this.$refs.designer.getJson();
//è·å–è¡¨å•çš„é…ç½®
const optionsJson = this.$refs.designer.getOptionsJson();


//todo ä¿å­˜JSONæ•°æ®åˆ°æ•°æ®åº“ä¸­
</code></pre>
<p>è¿™äº›æ•°æ®å¯ä»¥ç”¨æ¥ä¿å­˜åˆ°æ•°æ®åº“ä¸­ï¼Œç¡®ä¿è¡¨å•çš„çŠ¶æ€å’Œé…ç½®å¯ä»¥åœ¨é¡µé¢åˆ·æ–°æˆ–é‡æ–°åŠ è½½æ—¶æ¢å¤ã€‚</p>
<h2 id="å›æ˜¾è®¾è®¡è¡¨å•">å›æ˜¾è®¾è®¡è¡¨å•</h2>
<p>å½“éœ€è¦å›æ˜¾è®¾è®¡å¥½çš„è¡¨å•æ—¶ï¼Œæ‚¨éœ€è¦åŠ è½½ä¹‹å‰ä¿å­˜çš„ JSON è§„åˆ™å’Œé…ç½®ï¼Œå¹¶å°†å…¶åº”ç”¨åˆ°è®¾è®¡å™¨ä¸­ã€‚</p>
<pre><code class="language-js">//todo åŠ è½½è¡¨å•JSONè§„åˆ™


//å›æ˜¾è¡¨å•
this.$refs.designer.setOptions(optionsJson);
this.$refs.designer.setRule(ruleJson);
</code></pre>
<p>é€šè¿‡è¿™äº›æ–¹æ³•ï¼Œå¯ä»¥å°†ä¹‹å‰ä¿å­˜çš„è¡¨å•è§„åˆ™å’Œé…ç½®åº”ç”¨åˆ°è®¾è®¡å™¨ä¸­ï¼Œä»è€Œæ¢å¤è¡¨å•çš„çŠ¶æ€ã€‚</p>
<h2 id="è¡¨å•æ¸²æŸ“">è¡¨å•æ¸²æŸ“</h2>
<p>è¦æ¸²æŸ“è¡¨å•ï¼Œæ‚¨éœ€è¦æŒ‚è½½ form-create åˆ° Vue åº”ç”¨ä¸­ï¼Œå¹¶åŠ è½½è¡¨å•è§„åˆ™å’Œé…ç½®ã€‚</p>
<pre><code class="language-js">//ä»è®¾è®¡å™¨ä¸­å¯¼å…¥ formCreate
import {formCreate} from '@form-create/designer';
//æŒ‚è½½ formCreate
app.use(formCreate);
</code></pre>
<p><strong>è¡¨å•æ¸²æŸ“ç¤ºä¾‹</strong></p>
<pre><code class="language-html">&lt;template&gt;
    &lt;div id="app"&gt;
        &lt;form-create v-model="formData" v-model:api="fApi" :rule="rule" :option="option"&gt;&lt;/form-create&gt;
    &lt;/div&gt;
&lt;/template&gt;
&lt;script&gt;
    import {formCreate} from '@form-create/designer';
    export default {
        data() {
            return {
                //å®ä¾‹å¯¹è±¡
                fApi: {},
                //è¡¨å•æ•°æ®
                formData: {},
                //è¡¨å•ç”Ÿæˆè§„åˆ™
                rule: [],
                //ç»„ä»¶å‚æ•°é…ç½®
                option: {}
            }
        },
        beforeCreate(){
            const rule,option;
            // todo åŠ è½½è¡¨å•JSONè§„åˆ™
            this.rule = formCreate.parseJson(rule);
            this.option = formCreate.parseJson(option);
        }
    }
&lt;/script&gt;
</code></pre>
<h2 id="åŠ¨æ€åŠ è½½å’Œä¿å­˜è¡¨å•é…ç½®">åŠ¨æ€åŠ è½½å’Œä¿å­˜è¡¨å•é…ç½®</h2>
<p>å¯ä»¥é€šè¿‡ API è¯·æ±‚åŠ¨æ€åŠ è½½è¡¨å•è§„åˆ™å’Œé…ç½®ï¼Œå¹¶å°†è¡¨å•æ•°æ®ä¿å­˜åˆ°æœåŠ¡å™¨ã€‚</p>
<pre><code class="language-js">import axios from 'axios';


// åŠ è½½è¡¨å•é…ç½®
async function loadFormConfig() {
    try {
        const response = await axios.get('/api/form-config');
        return response.data;
    } catch (error) {
        console.error('åŠ è½½è¡¨å•é…ç½®å¤±è´¥', error);
        return { rule: [], option: {} };
    }
}


// ä¿å­˜è¡¨å•é…ç½®
async function saveFormConfig(ruleJson, optionsJson) {
    try {
        await axios.post('/api/form-config', { rule: ruleJson, options: optionsJson });
    } catch (error) {
        console.error('ä¿å­˜è¡¨å•é…ç½®å¤±è´¥', error);
    }
}
</code></pre>

</div>
<div class="clear"></div>

            </div>

<a href="javascript:void(0)" onclick="reportManager.report({ currentUserId: '', targetType: 'blogPost', targetId: '18987286', targetLink: 'https://www.cnblogs.com/xaboy/p/18987286', title: 'Vue å¼€æºé¡¹ç›®ä½ä»£ç è¡¨å•è®¾è®¡å™¨  FcDesigner v3.3 ç‰ˆæœ¬å‘å¸ƒ!å…¼å®¹Element Plus/Ant Design/Vant,æ”¯æŒPC/ç§»åŠ¨ç«¯' })">ä¸¾æŠ¥</a>
</div>
